title: Geopolitical Entity Frame
description: Frame JSON for geopolitical entities such as countries, regions, cities, municipalities and similar administrative units.

frame_type.description: Frame family identifier for a geopolitical entity.

id.description: Optional stable identifier for the entity (e.g. Wikidata QID).

name.description: Primary name of the geopolitical entity in the target language.

native_name.description: Name of the entity in its primary local / official language, if different from `name`.

short_name.description: Short or common name used in informal or abbreviated contexts.

parent_entity_name.description: Name of the higher-level entity that this entity is part of (e.g. country for a city, state for a district).

capital_name.description: Name of the capital city or administrative centre, if applicable.

seat_name.description: Name of the administrative seat if different from capital_name.

iso_codes.description: ISO or similar codes associated with this entity.

iso_3166_2.description: ISO 3166-2 subdivision code (for regions, states, provinces, etc.).

fips.description: Legacy FIPS or other regional code, if used.

continent_lemmas.description: Lemma-like labels for the continent(s) the entity belongs to.

region_lemmas.description: Lemma-like labels for supra-national or sub-continental regions (e.g. "europe", "middle_east").

country_lemmas.description: Lemma-like labels for the country the entity belongs to (for cities, regions, etc.).

language_lemmas.description: Lemma-like labels for official or major languages in the entity.

population_year.description: Reference year for the population value.

area_km2.description: Area of the entity, in square kilometres.

elevation_m.description: Typical or average elevation in metres, if relevant.

timezone_lemmas.description: List of timezone identifiers or lemma-like labels (e.g. "utc+1", "eastern_standard_time").

established.description: Year or approximate period when the entity was established or first recorded.

dissolved.description: Year or approximate period when the entity ceased to exist in its current form, if applicable.

neighbor_entity_names.description: Names of neighboring entities (countries, regions, municipalities, etc.), if applicable.

attributes.description: Bag of structured attributes for additional data not covered by dedicated fields (GDP, HDI, etc.). Values should be JSON-serializable.

extra.description: Opaque metadata preserved for tracing or debugging (original source rows, IDs, etc.).
